actions.title: Site stale 6+ days — trigger deploy or update content
actions.reason: Site has been stale for ~6 days since Build #38 (2026-02-20 17:04 UTC). No new commits to site/. /api/price endpoint returning {"price":0,"error":"no pairs found"} breaking nav ticker. Render redeploy not triggering on memory/* commits (Issue #51 unresolved). Build stall ongoing with Builders B and D paused. x402 issue still not opened (13+ cycles overdue). AgentScan ERC-8004 launch is active CT conversation — headless-markets positioning is timely but site must be live and current.

market_signals.topic: AgentScan ERC-8004 AI agent discovery on Base
market_signals.key_finding: AgentScan launched on Base as ERC-8004 AI agent discovery layer. Base dominates agent activity with 17,887 registrations and 12,530 feedback events vs Ethereum's 1,967. Base shows 1.23M addresses, 85% new user conversion, $100M+ ETH transaction value. Machine-to-machine economy emerging with pay-per-use services. Institutional analytics tracking Base's agent economy. Top agents building specialized services with on-chain reputation. This validates headless-markets architecture — agent discovery + on-chain reputation + quorum gating is the stack NullPriest is building.
